author: Remez Sasson
message: You get peace of mind not by thinking about it or imagining it, but by quietening and relaxing the restless mind.
title: Thought of the day

author: Richard Bach
message: Your friends will know you better in the first minute you meet than your acquaintances will know you in a thousand years.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lao Tzu
message: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
title: Thought of the day

author: Pema Chodron
message: When you begin to touch your heart or let your heart be touched, you begin to discover that it's bottomless.
title: Thought of the day
